name: IconButton
description:
Triggers actions using only an icon without text labels. Renders a <button> element.

Documentation: [IconButton Documentation](https://vapor-ui.goorm.io/docs/components/icon-button)

props.name: color
props.description: Use the color prop to change the color scheme of the button

props.name: aria-label
props.description: Defines a string value that labels the current element.

props.name: shape
props.description: Use the shape prop to change the shape of the icon button

props.name: size
props.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the button

props.name: render
props.description:
Allows you to replace the componentâ€™s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

props.name: variant
props.description: Use the variant prop to change the visual style of the button
